channel.title: Conference on David Moreno blog
channel.description: Recent content in Conference on David Moreno blog

item.title: Wonderful WordCamp NYC experience
item.description: I had a blast on Saturday. Let me put it again in bold, I had an awesome experience yesterday at WordCamp NYC. If you ever have the opportunity, you shouldn’t miss the chance to attend one of them, it’s really inspiring, people is very, very welcome and I loved the fact that there’s so many people with all sorts of backgrounds and focused on many fronts on the Web and blogging world, not just technical.
